org.nasdanika.cli

Annotation Type Description


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Description
    Specifies a classloader markdown resource with a detailed description of a command. The description is output to HTML documentation below the usage information. By default, if value attribute is not set, a resource with the same name as the annotated type and .md extension is used for description if it exists.
    Author:
    Pavel

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String icon
      Documentation icon.
      String tooltip
      Documentation tooltip.
      String value
      Description resource.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Description resource.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • icon

        public abstract String icon
        Documentation icon. Treated as URL if there is a slash and as a CSS class otherwise.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""

      • tooltip

        public abstract String tooltip
        Documentation tooltip.
        Returns:
        Default:
        ""
